alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Holmes; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 11:39AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson, western Gulf, Bay, Calhoun, eastern Holmes and eastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 1215 PM EDT/1115 AM CDT/... At 1139 AM EDT/1039 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Donalsonville to near Blountstown to 8 miles south of Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Blountstown, Marianna, Chipley, Graceville, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Chattahoochee, Bradford, Parker, Malone, Wewahitchka, Sneads and Cottondale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Holmes; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Washington
